text: Lozova (, ) or Lozovaya () is a city in Kharkiv Oblast (province) of eastern Ukraine. It is the administrative center (capital city) of the Lozova Raion (district). Lozova is also the center of Lozova urban hromada, one of the hromadas of Ukraine. Population: Lozova is the 2nd largest city in Kharkiv Oblast after Kharkiv by population. == References == Category:Cities in Kharkiv Oblast
title: Lozova
